Hi Morten, I cannot reproduce this.  Please reopen if you can.

Exact same situation here. Also with XML Buddy installed.
It works as soon as you uninstall XML Buddy.

Interesting: Before showing the NPE the editor complains about a missing Content-Type definition. Probably XML Buddy "steals" it somehow.
Ortwin, which version of WTP (and XML Buddy?) are you seeing this with?

BTW, Keith ... WORKSFORME is better 
resolution for unreproducable bug reports. :)
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
